description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a classic seek and find word search game, with more than a 10.000 words to create a random game with dimensions 10x10 to 20x20 and 10 types of letters, you never play the same game twice.
